0871A46B.Toast: As desperation grows, a more effective remedy for gut rot is needed.

1EADAE68.Callback2Header: Take the head from the Grotesque Trophy

3181449A.Phase32Description: I must travel to the clearing in the Corpsewail Deluge where I hope to commune with the witch Zurke. I should place the offering and light the nearby torches.

38C9C8C0.Phase29Description: Zurke has asked me to slay a snake known as Nuroth the Vile Fang. Once I kill him, I need to take his eye and return to Zurke.

4FECF0BA.Phase41Description: Zurke has asked me to place the eye in the animal corpse he has provided. I should have a cure after the animal reacts.

5E28741A.Callback31Header: Place the Grotesque Head in the Offering Bowl

B8A227EA.Callback4Header: Find the clearing in the Corpsewail Deluge

C9FCD1EA.Phase5Description: I must travel to the clearing in the Corpsewail Deluge where I hope to commune with the witch Zurke.

CB4D78C0.Callback46Header: Place the Eyeball of Nuroth and take what remains

D0A0975E.Callback53Header: Find Nuroth the Vile Fang and take his Eyes

D53BFF05.Phase0Description: Yolanda has asked me to take the head of the most recent hunter trophy nailed to the gate of Wejinhani. It should make a suitable offering to Zurke, the witch.

D787DBC2.Phase49Description: Zurke has asked me to slay a snake known as Nuroth the Vile Fang. Once I kill him, I need to take his eye and return to Zurke.

E2C708DD.Phase44Description: Zurke has given me a moldy heart and instructed me to return to Wejinhani to heal those suffering from gut rot. I hope Yolanda has enough time for the remedy to help.

E96ABF3F.Phase19Description: I should speak to Yolanda about the next steps of how to treat gut rot. She seems to have gotten worse.

F4A9EC5A.Phase14Description: I have made the offering and lit the torches. Now I must speak with the witch Zurke.
